name: Borders
description:
--

Borders is game where you check passports and talk to people.

Click the arrow for the next person to come forward.

Will you let them in no matter what the cost? Will you be a law-abiding officer and play by the rules? Or will you just try to save time by spamming the yes/no buttons?

Talk to people to find out a bit about themselves, or process them without a glance. Experience not 6, not 7, but 8 awkward conversations. 

--

A small project made for school, on the issue of refugees. 

Warning: Currently a work in progress, so you might see some weird bugs and other stuff. 

The latest version is the finished game.

Enjoy ^^

--
